document.full_text: the london stock exchange's shares rose sharply as analysts said the lse could find itself vulnerable to a bid if its planned tie-up with canada's tmx falls apart following a counter offer for tmx.
document.title: lse seen as bid target if tmx plan fails
lines_and_colors: the london stock exchange's shares rose sharply as analysts said the lse could find itself vulnerable to a bid if its planned tie-up with canada's tmx falls apart following a counter offer for tmx.
